content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
I just got cut on my hand.
Ouch! Clean the cut with soap and water, and apply a bandage or antibiotic ointment to help it heal quickly.
I got this hurt by a road rage and I need some medicines. Can you suggest me?
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that! For a minor cut, you can try over-the-counter pain reliever like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil) to help with pain and inflammation.
